comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Leopold Maximilian Joseph Maria Arnulf, Prinz von Bayern (9 February 1846 – 28 September 1930) was born in Munich, the son of Prince Regent Luitpold of Bavaria (1821–1912) and his wife Archduchess Augusta of Austria (1825–1864). He was a Field Marshal (Generalfeldmarschall) who commanded German and Austro-Hungarian forces on the Eastern Front in World War I. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Leopold_of_Bavaria

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks providing us with his full name Richard Arthur Norton. We'll add it to the record.
